kokomans_2 wrote:

> maybe I should've elaborated, my course is called ancient history :
> history up to the 16th century. My bad. Still, any help would be
> appreciated.

Oy, talk about theme expansion.... How do you cover *anything* in a class that
broad? You get one week on Egypt and one on Greece? <G>

You've been given a few things to look at. I'll mention my own book, "Samurai
1550-1600" -- Osprey Warrior Series #7.

Good luck!

Tony
